c:simple-property.c:description: A formatted sub pool statistics report.

metric.description: the JNDI name of the connection pool for this datasource
the maximum number of connections that are available
the number of connections that are currently in the pool

c:description: The minimum number of connections the pool should hold. The default is 0.

c:simple-property.name: max-pool-size
c:simple-property.c:description: The maximum number of connections the pool should hold. The default is 10.

c:simple-property.name: user-name
c:simple-property.description: The default username when creating a new connection.

c:simple-property.name: password
c:simple-property.description: The default password when creating a new connection.

c:description: The number of times that allocating a connection should be tried before throwing an exception. The default is 0.

c:simple-property.name: allocation-retry-wait-millis
c:simple-property.c:description: The time in milliseconds to wait between retrying to allocate a connection. The default is 5000 (5 seconds).

c:simple-property.name: background-validation
c:simple-property.c:description: Specify if connections should be validated on a background thread versus being validated prior to use. Background validation is meant to reduce the overall load on the RDBMS system when validating a connection. The default is No.

c:simple-property.name: background-validation-millis
c:simple-property.c:description: The interval, in milliseconds, at which the ConnectionValidator will run. Set to 0 to disable background validation. The default is 0.

c:simple-property.name: blocking-timeout-millis
c:simple-property.c:description: Indicates the maximum time in milliseconds to block while waiting for a connection before throwing an exception. Note that this blocks only while waiting for a permit for a connection, and will never throw an exception if creating a new connection takes an inordinately long time. The default is 30000 (30 seconds).

c:simple-property.name: idle-timeout-minutes
c:simple-property.c:description: The maximum time, in minutes, a connection may be idle before being closed. The default is 30.

c:simple-property.name: isSameRM-override-value
c:simple-property.c:description: If set, unconditionally sets the boolean return value of javax.transaction.xa.XAResource.isSameRM(XAResource).

c:simple-property.name: jmx-invoker-name
c:simple-property.c:description: The ObjectName of the JMX Invoker MBean associated with this datasource.

c:simple-property.name: typeMapping
c:simple-property.c:description: The name of the corresponding type-mapping in conf/standardjbosscmp-jdbc.xml.

c:simple-property.name: no-tx-separate-pools
c:simple-property.c:description: Whether or not to use separate pools. The default is Yes.

c:simple-property.name: prefill
c:simple-property.c:description: Whether to attempt to prefill the connection pool to the minimum number of connections. NOTE: Only supporting pools (OnePool) support this feature. A warning can be found in the logs if the pool does not support this. The default is No.

c:map-property.name: security-domain
c:map-property.c:description: Security settings for connections in the pool.

c:simple-property.name: securityDeploymentType
c:simple-property.c:description: Indicates whether Subject (from security domain), application-supplied parameters (such as from getConnection(user, pw)), both Subject and app-supplied parameters, or neither Subject nor app-supplied parameters are used to distinguish connections in the pool. The default is "NONE".

c:simple-property.name: domain
c:simple-property.c:description: The name of the JAAS security manager that will handle authentication (only required if security deployment type is DOMAIN or DOMAIN_AND_APPLICATION). This name correlates to the JAAS login-config.xml descriptor application-policy/name attribute.

c:simple-property.name: statistics-formatter
c:simple-property.c:description: The fully qualified class name of the class to use for formatting managed connection pool statistics for this datasource. The class must implement the org.jboss.resource.statistic.formatter.StatisticsFormatter. interface. The default is "org.jboss.resource.statistic.pool.JBossDefaultSubPoolStatisticFormatter".

c:simple-property.name: type-mapping
c:simple-property.c:description: The name of the corresponding type-mapping in conf/standardjbosscmp-jdbc.xml.

c:simple-property.name: use-java-context
c:simple-property.c:description: Indicates whether the JNDI name should be bound under the "java" context, which causes the DataSource to only be accessible from within the JBossAS VM. The default is Yes.

c:simple-property.name: use-strict-min
c:simple-property.c:description: Whether idle connections below the min-pool-size should be closed. The default is No.

c:simple-property.name: validate-on-match
c:simple-property.c:description: The validate-on-match element indicates whether or not connection level validation should be done when a connection factory attempts to match a managed connection for a given set. This is typically exclusive to the use of background validation. The default is Yes.

c:description: The SQL statement to use to check the validity of a pool connection.

c:simple-property.name: connection-definition
c:simple-property.c:description: The connection definition inside the RAR deployment uniquely identified by the connection factory interface, e.g. "javax.sql.DataSource".

c:simple-property.name: exception-sorter-class-name
c:simple-property.c:description: The fully qualified name of a Java class to use to check if an exception should be broadcast.

c:simple-property.name: new-connection-sql
c:simple-property.c:description: An SQL statement to execute whenever a new connection is added to the pool; this can be used to set the connection schema, etc.

c:simple-property.name: prepared-statement-cache-size
c:simple-property.c:description: The number of prepared statements per connection to be kept open and reused in subsequent requests. They are stored in an LRU cache. Set to 0 to disable the cache. The default is 0.

c:simple-property.name: query-timeout
c:simple-property.c:description: Any configured query timeout in seconds. A value of 0 means no timeout. The default is 0.

c:simple-property.name: rar-name
c:simple-property.c:description: The RAR deployment to associate with the connection manager MBean. e.g. jms-ra.rar or myapplication.ear#my.rar for nested rars.

c:simple-property.name: set-tx-query-timeout
c:simple-property.c:description: Whether to set the query timeout based on the time remaining until transaction timeout; any configured query timeout will be used if there is no transaction. The default is No.

c:simple-property.name: share-prepared-statements
c:simple-property.c:description: Should prepared statements be shared? The default is No.

c:simple-property.name: stale-connection-checker-class-name
c:simple-property.c:description: Fully qualified name of the Java class used to check if a connection has become stale.

c:simple-property.name: track-statements
c:simple-property.c:description: Whether to check for unclosed Statements and ResultSets when connections are returned to the pool. The default is "yes-no-warnings".

c:simple-property.name: transaction-isolation
c:simple-property.description: The Transaction Isolation level. The default setting is to use whichever isolation level is provided by default by the database.

c:simple-property.name: url-delimiter
c:simple-property.c:description: Specifies the delimiter for URLs in connection-url for HA datasources.

c:simple-property.name: url-selector-strategy-class-name
c:simple-property.c:description: The fully qualified class name of a class that implements the org.jboss.resource.adapter.jdbc.URLSelectorStrategy interface.

c:simple-property.name: use-try-lock
c:simple-property.c:description: Any configured timeout, in milliseconds, for internal locks on the resource adapter objects. A value of 0 means no timeout. The default is 0.

c:simple-property.name: valid-connection-checker-class-name
c:simple-property.c:description: Fully qualified name of the Java class used to validate if a connection is valid.

c:map-property.name: connection-properties
c:map-property.description: Arbitrary connection properties that should be passed to the java.sql.Driver.connect(url, props) method.

c:simple-property.name: rar-name
c:simple-property.c:description: The name of the RAR file that contains the definition for the resource we want to provide. For nested RAR files, the name would look like myapplication.ear#my.rar.

c:simple-property.description: The maximum number of query plans that are cached. Note: this is a memory based cache. (default 250)

c:simple-property.description: Process pool maximum thread count. (default 16) Increase this value if your load includes a large number of XQueries or if the system's available processors is larger than 8

c:simple-property.description: Query processor time slice, in milliseconds. (default 2000)

c:simple-property.name: lobChunkSizeInKB

c:simple-property.name: codeTablesMaxCount
c:simple-property.description: The max lob chunk size in KB transferred each time when processing blobs, clobs(100KB default)

c:simple-property.name: resultSetCacheEnabled

c:simple-property.name: processorBatchSize
c:simple-property.description: The max row count of a batch sent internally within the query processor. Should be <= the connectorBatchSize. (default 256)

c:simple-property.name: connectorBatchSize
c:simple-property.description: The max row count of a batch from a connector. Should be even multiple of processorBatchSize. (default 512)

c:simple-property.name: maxProcessingBatchesColumns
c:simple-property.description: The number of batch columns guarenteed to a processing operation. Set this value lower if the workload typically processes larger numbers of concurrent queries with large intermediate results from operations such as sorting, grouping, etc. (default 128)

c:simple-property.name: maxFileSize
c:simple-property.description: Max file size for buffer files (default 2GB)

c:simple-property.name: maxReserveBatchColumns
c:simple-property.description: The number of batch columns to allow in memory (default 16384). This value should be set lower or higher depending on the available memory to Teiid in the VM. 16384 is considered a good default for a dedicated 32-bit VM running Teiid with a 1 gig heap.

c:simple-property.name: outputBufferSize

c:simple-property.description: Max allowed time before the session is terminated by the system, 0 indicates unlimited (default 0)

c:simple-property.description: Maximum number of sessions allowed by the system (default 5000)
